extendedInfo.description: Walkthrough for the 5 Angry Birds games: Classic, Seasons, Rio, Space, and Heikki! Includes golden eggs, UTOPIA, PIGLANTIS, fruits, secrets, etc.)Angry Birds Guide is an app that will help you find the solution for any Angry Birds level with just a few clicks, instead of manually searching for it. Key features include:*UTOPIA TUTORIAL, PIGLANTIS TUTORIAL, HEIKKI GAME TUTORIAL* How to clear any level of Angry Birds 1, Angry Birds Space, Angry Birds Rio and Angry Birds Seasons with 3 stars, including the newest ones.* Location of all golden eggs, eggsteroids and fruits* How to unlock secret levels* How to clear Mighty Dragon levels of Year of the Dragon* Clear Trophy Room levels from Rio with 3 stars* As soon as Rovio releases new levels, we will make an update that include themYou can send us feedback to cubapps@gmail.comBTW, Youtube and an internet connection is required to watch the videos online (you don't need to download the more than 800 videos if you are going to watch just a few, right?)Have Fun!(Remember to rate and share)NOTE: The solutions are videos available for free, not of our property. We are not in any way associated with Rovio.  If you want your video tutorials to appear in these app, please email us.

reviews.title: Love this app!!!
reviews.comment: This app is awesome. It shows exactly how to get 3 stars in every Angry Bird game. Shows where every bonus game is and how to get 3 stars there to. A must have app. Love it!!!!
reviews.author: Kimberly Harbert

reviews.title: Update Needed!!!!
reviews.comment: App works great...no snags with my phone.  It\'s been helpful with all of my Angry Birds games.  Only problem is it hasn\'t gotten updated in a long time and I have to go elsewhere for the newest walkthroughs.  PLEASE UPDATE SOON!!!!
reviews.author: Amy Whittaker

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Links to YouTube videos so you don\'t have to search (yay). Works flawlessly for me.Doesn\'t have the newest levels or game versions yet which is the reason I give only 3*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Needs to have all levels even the specials to help pass levelsx

reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.title: Very helpful

reviews.title: Stress Reducer!
reviews.comment: Regardless of how hard you try, nothing is working. There\'s still that one pig left. You absolutely need this app! On my Samsung the app works great!

reviews.title: Angry Birds Help
reviews.comment: Extremely helpful insights into all the levels and games. I would like it if they could add Angry Birds Star Wars into the mix. Then all the helpful would be for all the games combined.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The guide was excellent.
reviews.comment: The guide was helpful. But, the guide wasn\'t include Angry Birds Star Wars. The Classic guide wasn\'t include the Bad Piggies level. The season guide was incomplete too. And, what is Angry Birds Heikki? I couldn\'t download it for times. But still, the remaining guide was awesome. I give you 4 stars.
reviews.author: Nindyo Artha Dewantara Wardhana

reviews.title: Bewildered
reviews.comment: For the most part great. I wonder if there are different games, versions. I don\'t have an eagle eye on my game and on some of the answers did not show the power for me getting the three stars. Ex. Seasons 2012, 1-9.  I had to find a different way to get it. I only use this very sparringly, after days of trying.
